job_details.Functieomschrijving:
We are looking for a Data Engineer to join us in Amsterdam. I n this role, you will be responsible for designing, building, and optimizing complex data pipelines to process transactional and ot her data . Y ou will collaborate closely w ith data scientists and analysts in developing and maintaining data solutions and INGA's data architecture to support the next generation of products and data initiatives.
   We are looking for curious and empathetic individuals who are committed to developing themselves and learning new skills. We hire people based on an evaluation of their potential and support them throughout their time in Amsterdam. Come join us!

   A working day in the life of a Data Engineer
   A typical day for a data engineer s tarts with coffee, catching up with colleagues, and drafting a plan for the coming day. A fter the standup , you will start e xploring the data to solve business problems, building and maintaining the production-ready infrastructure , and building the data pipelines that clean, transform, and aggregate data from disparate sources. Being an advocate for best practices in data engineering is important while working on such task s .
   After lunch, you organized a knowledge - sharing session to explain data security, compli a nce, and privacy standards to the rest of the data engineering team. Finally, to wrap up the day, you collaborated with the data science and analysts' teams to develop data models and pipelines for research, reporting, and machine learning., We hire smart people like you for your potential. Our biggest expectation is that you'll stay curious. Keep learning. Take on responsibility. In return, we'll back you to develop into an even more awesome version of yourself.
job_details.full_text:
Data Engineer SATM

We are looking for a Data Engineer to join us in Amsterdam. I n this role, you will be responsible for designing, building, and optimizing complex data pipelines to process transactional and ot her data . Y ou will collaborate closely w ith data scientists and analysts in developing and maintaining data solutions and INGA's data architecture to support the next generation of products and data initiatives.
   We are looking for curious and empathetic individuals who are committed to developing themselves and learning new skills. We hire people based on an evaluation of their potential and support them throughout their time in Amsterdam. Come join us!

   A working day in the life of a Data Engineer
   A typical day for a data engineer s tarts with coffee, catching up with colleagues, and drafting a plan for the coming day. A fter the standup , you will start e xploring the data to solve business problems, building and maintaining the production-ready infrastructure , and building the data pipelines that clean, transform, and aggregate data from disparate sources. Being an advocate for best practices in data engineering is important while working on such task s .
   After lunch, you organized a knowledge - sharing session to explain data security, compli a nce, and privacy standards to the rest of the data engineering team. Finally, to wrap up the day, you collaborated with the data science and analysts' teams to develop data models and pipelines for research, reporting, and machine learning., We hire smart people like you for your potential. Our biggest expectation is that you'll stay curious. Keep learning. Take on responsibility. In return, we'll back you to develop into an even more awesome version of yourself.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on traditional data engineering tasks like building and optimizing data pipelines and infrastructure. While it mentions collaboration with data scientists and analysts for machine learning, it lacks specific details about developing or deploying ML models, which are core to ML or GenAI Engineer roles.

phrases: designing, building, and optimizing complex data pipelines
process transactional and other data
developing and maintaining data solutions
building and maintaining the production-ready infrastructure
building the data pipelines that clean, transform, and aggregate data from disparate sources
best practices in data engineering
develop data models and pipelines for research, reporting, and machine learning
job_tasks.justification: These phrases directly describe the core activities of data engineering: creating, managing, and optimizing data infrastructure and pipelines for processing, cleaning, transforming, and aggregating data.

phrases: support the next generation of products and data initiatives
solve business problems
research, reporting, and machine learning
job_tasks.justification: These phrases indicate an understanding of how data engineering efforts contribute to broader business goals, product development, and supporting various analytical and ML needs.

phrases: collaborate closely with data scientists and analysts
exploring the data to solve business problems
organized a knowledge-sharing session to explain data security, compliance, and privacy standards
collaborated with the data science and analysts' teams
job_tasks.justification: The job description emphasizes working with other teams (data scientists, analysts) and sharing knowledge, which are key aspects of communication and collaboration.

phrases: committed to developing themselves and learning new skills
We hire people based on an evaluation of their potential and support them throughout their time
Keep learning.
develop into an even more awesome version of yourself
job_tasks.justification: The text explicitly mentions a commitment to learning, developing new skills, and continuous improvement, aligning with the learning and adaptability skill.

phrases: Take on responsibility.
take full responsibility for the quality and success of one's work
job_tasks.justification: Phrases like 'Take on responsibility' and the implied ownership of data solutions point towards a need for initiative and accountability.

phrases: exploring the data to solve business problems
designing, building, and optimizing complex data pipelines
job_tasks.justification: The role involves tackling complex data challenges and building robust solutions, which requires problem-solving skills and a pragmatic approach to engineering.

phrases: data security, compliance, and privacy standards
job_tasks.justification: The mention of data security, compliance, and privacy standards highlights the importance of ethical and legal considerations in handling data.

technologies.justification: The phrase 'develop data models' directly relates to the creation or adaptation of data structures for analysis or machine learning.
The job explicitly mentions building and maintaining data pipelines and production infrastructure, which falls under MLOps and data pipeline management.
Collaboration with data scientists and analysts implies the use of data analysis techniques and tools.

phrases: committed to developing themselves and learning new skills
We hire people based on an evaluation of their potential and support them throughout their time
Keep learning.
develop into an even more awesome version of yourself
soft_skills.justification: The job description strongly emphasizes continuous learning, skill development, and adaptability to new technologies and methodologies.

phrases: collaborate closely with data scientists and analysts
organized a knowledge-sharing session to explain data security, compliance, and privacy standards
collaborated with the data science and analysts' teams
soft_skills.justification: The role requires close collaboration with other teams and knowledge sharing, indicating a need for strong communication and teamwork.

phrases: exploring the data to solve business problems
designing, building, and optimizing complex data pipelines
soft_skills.justification: The core responsibilities involve solving complex data-related business problems and building efficient data solutions, requiring problem-solving skills and a pragmatic approach.

phrases: Take on responsibility.
soft_skills.justification: The expectation to 'Take on responsibility' suggests a need for initiative and ownership of tasks and projects.

phrases: data security, compliance, and privacy standards
soft_skills.justification: The mention of data security, compliance, and privacy highlights the importance of adhering to ethical and legal standards in data handling.
